name: @sullux/fp-light-function
description: A lightweight functional library containing function helpers such as curry, memoize and pipe.

scripts.package: npm run build && node ../../package.js && cp README.md dist/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm test && cd dist && npm publish --access public

author: Charles Sullivan <sullux@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Sullux)
